1.long: an untranslatable particle, generally answered by "de", each of the two introducing a clause intended to be contrasted with the other.

1.brief: a thing pronounced to be just
1.long: a thing pronounced (by God) to be righteous (just, the right); or the restoration of a criminal, a fresh chance given him; a righteous deed, an instance of perfect righteousness.
service rendered to God, perhaps simply: worship.
set apart by (or for) God, holy, sacred.
earthly, worldly (belonging to the present earthly world as opposed to the heavenly and future).

2.long: a tent, booth, tabernacle, abode, dwelling, mansion, habitation.
I build, construct, prepare, make ready.

2.brief: a table for food or business
2.long: a table, (a) for food or banqueting, (b) for money-changing or business.
a setting forth, the show-bread; predetermination, purpose.
(denoting speech in progress), (a) I say, speak; I mean, mention, tell, (b) I call, name, especially in the pass., (c) I tell, command.
set apart by (or for) God, holy, sacred.

3.long: (a) gen: with, in company with, (b) acc: (1) behind, beyond, after, of place, (2) after, of time, with nouns, neut. of adjectives.

3.brief: but, on the other hand, and
3.long: a weak adversative particle, generally placed second in its clause; but, on the other hand, and.

3.brief: second, in the second place, for the second time
3.long: second; with the article: in the second place, for the second time.

(lit: that which is spread out downwards, that which hangs down), a curtain, veil, of that which separated the Holy of Holies from the outer parts of the temple at Jerusalem, also of an outer curtain at the entrance to the Holy Place in the same temple.
a tent, booth, tabernacle, abode, dwelling, mansion, habitation.
(denoting speech in progress), (a) I say, speak; I mean, mention, tell, (b) I call, name, especially in the pass., (c) I tell, command.
set apart by (or for) God, holy, sacred.
set apart by (or for) God, holy, sacred.

4.long: golden, made of gold, adorned with gold.
(ordinarily: censer, but) either the altar of incense, or the shovel, on which the high-priest poured the coals, when he entered the Holy of Holies on the Day of Atonement.
(properly: a wooden box, hence) the Ark, in which Noah sailed; the Ark of the Covenant.
(a) a covenant between two parties, (b) (the ordinary, everyday sense [found a countless number of times in papyri]) a will, testament.
I cover up, cover round about, veil round, blindfold.
from all sides, on all sides.
a piece of gold, golden ornament.
golden, made of gold, adorned with gold.
(Hebrew), manna, the supernatural food eaten by the Israelites in the desert: of spiritual food.
a rod, staff, staff of authority, scepter.
Aaron, son of Amram and Jochebed, brother of Moses.

4.brief: I sprout, cause to sprout, make to grow up
4.long: intrans: I sprout; trans: I cause to sprout, make to grow up.
(a) a covenant between two parties, (b) (the ordinary, everyday sense [found a countless number of times in papyri]) a will, testament.

5.brief: he, she, it, they, them, same
5.long: he, she, it, they, them, same.
honor, renown; glory, an especially divine quality, the unspoken manifestation of God, splendor.
(a) a sin offering, by which the wrath of the deity shall be appeased; a means of propitiation, (b) the covering of the ark, which was sprinkled with the atoning blood on the Day of Atonement.
adv. (a) of time: just now, even now; just at hand, immediately, (b) of logical connection: now then, (c) in commands and appeals: at this instant.
(denoting speech in progress), (a) I say, speak; I mean, mention, tell, (b) I call, name, especially in the pass., (c) I tell, command.

service rendered to God, perhaps simply: worship.

gen: in behalf of; acc: above.

8.long: I make clear (visible, manifest), make known.

intrinsically good, good in nature, good whether it be seen to be so or not, the widest and most colorless of all words with this meaning.

large, great, in the widest sense.
